tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sustainable_farming_practices_info (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   practice_name VARCHAR(255),
   description TEXT,
   impact_on_environment VARCHAR(255),
   benefits_to_farmers TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE sustainable_farming_practices (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  practice_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  benefit VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE farmers_information (
  farmer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  farmer_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  contact_number VARCHAR(20),
  practice_id UUID,
  FOREIGN KEY (practice_id) REFERENCES sustainable_farming_practices(id)
)

CREATE TABLE SustainableFarmingPractices (
    practice_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    practice_name STRING NOT NULL,
    description STRING,
    benefits STRING
)

CREATE TABLE Farmer_Practices (
    farmer_id INT,
    practice_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (farmer_id) REFERENCES Farmers(farmer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (practice_id) REFERENCES Practices(practice_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (farmer_id, practice_id)
);
